nl.esciencecenter.neon.util

Class QuitListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.util.QuitListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jogamp.newt.event.NEWTEventListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.WindowListener, EventListener

    public class QuitListener
extends Object
implements com.jogamp.newt.event.WindowListener
    Listener for a quit action (like pressing the X on the top right of the screen. DOES System.exit(0) because nothing else would work, so be careful!!
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
